items.sentence: The doctor told Tom to lower the amount of red meat that he ate.
The apples from the tree behind Tom\'s house are very delicious.
Tom bought that car for three thousand dollars three months ago.
Tom can speak French better than any other student in his class.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to get the raise he\'d asked for.
If I\'d known Tom was going to be in Boston, I\'d have told you.
If Tom\'s girlfriend knew he was here now, she\'d be very angry.
There may be other alternatives that we haven\'t thought of yet.
I never expected to find such a nice hotel in a place like this.
I ought to have enough money saved up to buy a car by Christmas.
